seo.title: Case Studies | Christian Varisco
seo.description: Discover how I've helped startups build successful products, raise funding, and scale their technical teams. Real results from real partnerships.

hero.subtitle: From early-stage ideas to market-ready products. Our customers include enterprises and startups across HR tech, fintech, legal tech, and more.

footerCTA.subtitle: Let's discuss how I can help you achieve your technical and business goals.

items.shortDescription: Talent management platform helping businesses effectively engage, develop, and retain talent through a skill-based approach.

testimonial.quote: The project is still ongoing and so far Christian has been very supportive! He is driving the entire Tech team towards the milestones we have and he is making sure we deliver a zero-defect product to our customers.
testimonial.author: Giacomo Marchiori

seo.title: Talentware Case Study | Christian Varisco
seo.description: How I helped Talentware raise €800k in pre-seed funding and go from idea to paying customers in just 3 months.

items.shortDescription: Mobile app that democratizes wine investment, offering users a virtual cellar to buy, store, and manage wine investments.

testimonial.quote: A competent, dynamic and always available person. A fractional CTO as it should be!
testimonial.author: Riccardo Tripodi

seo.title: Liquinvex Case Study | Christian Varisco
seo.description: How I helped Liquinvex build a top-notch team in one week and achieve 100% user base growth through rapid feature development.

items.shortDescription: AI-powered legal research tool that quickly provides relevant legal sources and drafts opinions based on user queries.

testimonial.quote: Christian helped us a lot to draw up an initial product development roadmap and to understand how to build the tech team, identifying the necessary figures to start with limited resources.
testimonial.author: Martina Domenicali
testimonial.role: Co-founder & CSO at Lexroom.ai and Community Builder

seo.title: Lexroom.ai Case Study | Christian Varisco
seo.description: How I helped Lexroom.ai secure €500k in pre-seed funding by building a strong technical foundation and talented team.
